game.title: The Dragon's Treasure
game.description: The dragon has been terrorizing the village for years. It is said that it has a vast treasure hidden in its lair. The villagers have hired you to find the treasure and slay the dragon.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces, a magic sword, and the dragon's hoard.

task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the mountains to the north of the village.
task.location: Mountains to the north of the village

task.description: The dragon is a powerful creature. Be sure to come prepared.
The dragon's treasure is hidden in a secret chamber within the lair.
task.location: Secret chamber within the dragon's lair
